ca.usask.simlab.odeToJava.modules.errorControl

Class EmbErrImplicitPredictiveControllerModule

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.usask.simlab.odeToJava.property.PropertyUser
      • ca.usask.simlab.odeToJava.solver.SolverModule
        • ca.usask.simlab.odeToJava.modules.errorControl.BaseErrorControllerModule
          • ca.usask.simlab.odeToJava.modules.errorControl.EmbErrControllerModule
            • ca.usask.simlab.odeToJava.modules.errorControl.EmbErrImplicitPredictiveControllerModule

  • public class EmbErrImplicitPredictiveControllerModule
extends EmbErrControllerModule
    This class implements a stepsize controller that finds an optimal stepsize based on an embedded error estimate.

    Ernst Hairer and Gerhard Wanner. "Solving Order Differential Equations II, 2nd Edition", pg.124.

    Kjell Gustafsson. "Control-theoretic techniques for stepsize selection in implicit Runge-Kutta methods", ACM Transactions on Mathematical Software, vol. 20, no. 4, pg. 496-517, December 1994.
